title: stampd
details: Stampd, a cross-platform app, reimagines traditional Buy X Get Y loyalty cards. Clients effortlessly accumulate stamps by scanning a unique QR code, streamlining reward tracking. For business owners, Stampd provides efficient tools to drive engagement and growth, bridging user convenience with technological advancement in loyalty programs.

title: Mentor Match
details: A comprehensive mentoring platform featuring seamless integration of chat, payment capabilities, and an advanced scheduling system, ensuring a fully functional and cohesive user experience.
role: Lead Frontend developer, Assistant backend developer

title: Fragments
details: Robust and adaptable platform uniquely tailored for processing text fragments and images. Harnessing the vast array of AWS services, this application has been meticulously developed to guarantee exceptional scalability, reliability, and efficiency
